Recommendations

Christmas is associated not only with Christmas dinner but also with a large number of social and cultural events throughout December. At present, there are no measures governing the Christmas market regime. In some cities, however, it is already known that Christmas markets will not take place in the usual form.

The lighting of Christmas trees is most often an event organized by the municipality. You can find out more information from the website of the municipality, local radio, etc.

If masses are allowed, follow the basic hygienic principles (principle Wear Z – face masks, social distance, disinfect your hands).

Singing is a very risky activity, and therefore it is necessary to be very careful in close contact, for example at Christmas concert, school party, etc., keep your distance and wear a face mask.

It is not yet known what measures will apply in the period of December concerning the Christmas parties (corporate, etc.).
